hero.title: GLSofort® Gene Sequencing Analysis Service
hero.subtitle: Industry-leading automated genomic data interpretation platform powered by deep machine learning, designed by Illumina team with AI scientists, integrating and maturely applying clinical expertise such as ACMG and CAP/CLIA (one of the few successful AI models in the industry) - Virtual Geneticist System 'VG'

intro.title: Our Company's Proprietary Software Platform Sofort®
intro.description: A pioneer focused on interpreting gene sequencing (NGS) results, supported by artificial intelligence (AI) and deep machine learning (Deep ML) to achieve efficient and precise gene sequencing interpretation, including whole genome (WGS), whole exome (WES) and targeted gene detection (Target gene panel). It is currently an international clinical genomics interpretation support tool that can adapt to various pipelines and tests, greatly improving patient diagnosis quantity, efficiency and accuracy. It can provide support for sequencing laboratories and clinical medicine, achieving comprehensive analysis and integration into a complete solution.

panel.scope:
Multiple cancer types
Any disease gene panel

wes.scope:
All cancer types
All genetic diseases: 7000+ hereditary disease screening

wgs.scope:
All cancer types

ai.title: Virtual Geneticist System
ai.description: GLSofort® combines first-class bioinformatics systems with virtual geneticist technology applications, achieving intelligent gene interpretation through AI and deep machine learning.

speed.title: Ultra-high Efficiency Analysis Speed
speed.description: Significantly reduces gene testing analysis time from weeks to hours, dramatically improving clinical diagnostic efficiency.

accuracy.title: Precision Advantage
accuracy.description: Greatly improves patient diagnosis quantity, efficiency and accuracy, providing reliable gene interpretation results for clinical use.

compliance.title: Clinical Standards Compliance
compliance.description: Strictly follows international clinical standards such as ACMG and CAP/CLIA, ensuring the authority and reliability of diagnostic results.

integration.title: Intelligent Integration Function
integration.description: Unique patented design enables GLSofort® system to have automatic search for latest research findings and intelligent integration capabilities.

discovery.title: New Discovery Capability
discovery.description: Can obtain new discoveries through accumulated clinical and genomic databases, continuously improving interpretation capabilities and accuracy.

hero.title: Sequencer Reagent Kits
hero.subtitle: Self-developed high-throughput sequencing chips and sequencing reagents, providing complete kits for NextSeq500/550 sequencers with performance comparable to Illumina original consumables

overview.title: Product Overview
overview.description: Our self-developed high-throughput sequencing chips and sequencing reagents provide high-quality, cost-effective solutions for genetic testing. Products undergo strict quality control and multi-batch validation to ensure each batch meets or exceeds industry standards.

reagents.title: Sequencing Reagents
reagents.description: Contains sequencing reaction reagents and sequencing buffer solutions, carefully formulated and strictly quality controlled to ensure stability and consistency of sequencing reactions.

chips.title: High-throughput Sequencing Chips
chips.description: Self-developed high-throughput sequencing chips capable of producing 400M reads per run, with stable performance and excellent data quality.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control Results
qualityControl.description: Sequencing reagent kits have undergone multi-batch testing and all passed validation with high quality. Data output and quality compared with Illumina reagent kits all meet standards and above. The following are quality control results from three batches:

quality.title: High Quality Assurance
quality.description: Strict quality control system ensures every batch undergoes comprehensive testing, guaranteeing Q30 values ≥91% with stable and reliable data output.

performance.title: Excellent Performance
performance.description: Single run produces 400M+ high-quality reads, performance comparable to Illumina original consumables with more cost advantages.

compatibility.title: Perfect Compatibility
compatibility.description: Specifically designed for NextSeq500/550 sequencers, fully compatible with existing experimental workflows without additional equipment investment.

hero.title: Health Screening
hero.subtitle: Based on mature genetic testing technology, we provide comprehensive health risk assessment and personalized health management solutions to help you achieve precision medicine and scientific prevention

overview.title: Health Screening Services Overview
overview.description: We provide comprehensive genetic health screening services from children to adults. Through advanced genetic testing technology, we help you understand disease risks, optimize medication plans, guide lifestyle choices, and achieve personalized health management.

adult.title: Adult Whole Exome Health Assessment Package
adult.description: Helps us understand our disease risk index and genetic disease carrier status. Through genetic information testing, we can clarify differences in amino acid sequences, structures, and biological functions of proteins related to drug receptors, transport, and metabolism, helping you achieve personalized, refined treatment, reduce toxic side effects/adverse reactions, and comprehensively improve medication efficacy. Through the detection and interpretation of trait-related genetic information, we can help us seek advantages and avoid disadvantages in various physiological processes and social activities, helping us improve quality of life and life achievement.

child.title: Pediatric Whole Exome Health Assessment Package
child.description: Whole exome health assessment designed specifically for children, early detection of genetic disease risks, providing scientific guidance for healthy child development.

adult.title: Adult Whole Genome Health Assessment Package
adult.description: The most comprehensive genetic testing with the largest amount of data. One sequencing, lifelong benefits. Having 'personal whole genome data' will be able to link to the latest gene-related interpretations globally, predict disease risks, understand your own DNA code, understand your disease risk index and genetic disease carrier screening, more accurate precision medication to understand your drug metabolism and avoid harm from inappropriate medication

child.title: Pediatric Whole Genome Health Assessment Package
child.description: The most comprehensive children's genetic testing service, one test for lifelong benefits, providing comprehensive genetic information support for children's healthy growth.

adult.title: Adult Gene Chip Screening Package
adult.description: Based on mature genetic testing technology, testing over 700,000 gene sequence sites, interpretation includes disease risk, precision medication, diet, exercise, nutrition, traits and other related content, providing effective basis for customers' precision health management.

child.title: Pediatric Gene Chip Screening Package
child.description: Gene chip screening designed specifically for children, covering multiple dimensions of genetic testing including growth and development, nutritional metabolism, and safe medication.

cancer.title: Male and Female Cancer Seven-Item Panel
cancer.description: Genetic risk assessment for common cancers, providing scientific basis for early prevention and screening.

childMedicine.title: Pediatric Safe Medication (115 Items)
childMedicine.description: Referring to clinical guidelines such as CPIC, Guidelines for Genetic Testing Technology of Drug Metabolizing Enzymes and Drug Target Genes (Trial), and pharmacogenomics database PharmGKB, with real-time updates, providing gene-level reference for children, conducting individualized precision medication guidance, and avoiding drug toxicity harm to children.

healthReport.title: Personal Health Check-up 78-Item Genetic Testing Report
healthReport.description: Comprehensive analysis of genetic factors in current common health problems, providing health solutions, and guiding users in scientific and precise disease prevention. Scientific assessment of disease risk, providing personalized prevention recommendations for users, helping customers adjust lifestyle, choose appropriate diet and proper physical examination.

childTraits.title: Pediatric Growth Traits Genetic Testing Product
childTraits.description: Through testing and interpretation of genetic information in six major dimensions and 65 growth-related interpretation items, help you better understand your child's growth traits, further enhancing your understanding of children in six directions: child development, nutritional metabolism, sports fitness, health management, daily care, and potential development

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Coverage
comprehensive.description: From children to adults, from disease risks to personality traits, providing full life-cycle genetic health management services.

precision.title: Precise Analysis
precision.description: Based on the latest genomics research findings, providing accurate risk assessment and personalized recommendations.

safety.title: Safe Medication
safety.description: Through pharmacogenomics testing, avoid adverse reactions caused by inappropriate medication, achieving individualized precision medication.

lifelong.title: Lifelong Benefits
lifelong.description: One test, lifelong benefits. Genetic information remains unchanged, continuously obtaining the latest scientific interpretations and health guidance.

hero.title: Data Compression System
hero.subtitle: ZipHelix massive data integrated solution system, solving sequencing data storage problems. GenomeLight introduces ZipHelix massive data integrated solution system, which can perform orderly archiving and lossless compression of raw data from the source. Multiple configurations meet the needs of different medical institutions and provide professional after-sales service to create a comprehensive gene data storage solution.

overview.title: ZipHelix Product Overview
overview.description: ZipHelix is an efficient compression storage solution designed specifically for gene sequencing data, using innovative compression algorithms to provide safe, efficient, and economical data management services for medical institutions.

compression.title: Innovative Compression Algorithm
compression.description: ZipHelix's innovative fastq file compression algorithm achieves 2.25 times the compression rate of gzip, saving more than half the storage space and reducing cost investment by more than half

automation.title: Automated Archiving
automation.description: ZipHelix embedded compression algorithm system can automatically perform batch data backup and archiving

storage.title: Object Storage Protection
storage.description: Data is stored in object storage, ensuring no data loss in case of hard disk damage. After new hard disk installation, data is automatically restored without manual operation

flexible.title: Multiple Configurations
flexible.description: Multiple configurations to meet different scenario requirements

companyIntro.title: Company Introduction
companyIntro.companyName: Chongqing GenomeLight Biotechnology Co., Ltd. (Genome Light)
companyIntro.description1: Located in Chongqing Hi-tech Development Zone, we are a high-tech life health enterprise driven by precision medical services and AI big data technology, innovating future medical models.
companyIntro.description2: Our company's strength lies in focusing on the interpretation, annotation, and analysis of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) results, particularly in the bioinformatics interpretation and disease annotation of Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS), Whole Exome Sequencing (WES), and targeted Gene Panel high-throughput testing results in the field of genetic and rare diseases, with significant technical advantages (high accuracy and fast analysis speed). Serving clinical and research needs, based on core technical advantages, we have established a comprehensive testing and analysis technology system, developed products covering gene sequencing interpretation services, genetic disease gene diagnosis, and COVID-19 testing. We can provide precision medical services for domestic genetic disease patients and healthy populations, including carrier gene screening, (large) family screening, and population array analysis, providing comprehensive genomic testing solutions centered on high-throughput sequencing (NGS) for clinical medical workers and researchers.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Work closely with the medical community to support reliable and accurate diagnosis.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Drive excellence with AI, precisely serving genetic disease patients and families.

product.title: Product Philosophy
product.content: Technology innovation and technical leadership in high-quality products and services are the foundation of our enterprise and the direct embodiment of technological innovation. GenomeLight will focus on solving industry pain points.

service.title: Service Philosophy
service.content: Integrity first, customer paramount. GenomeLight will provide the highest quality service with a professional, focused, and dedicated attitude.

values.title: Core Values
values.content: Innovation: We continuously seek better solutions to meet the needs of patients and healthcare providers. Empathy: We deeply understand patients and medical professionals, caring for and respecting their feelings. Integrity: We adhere to the highest ethical and transparency standards, ensuring data security and confidentiality. Collaboration: We actively collaborate with the medical community, research institutions, and patient communities to jointly improve genetic disease management.

team.title: Team Introduction
team.description: Strong technical capabilities are the cornerstone supporting our high-quality products and services. Our core technology R&D team consists of senior scientists and engineers from home and abroad, including advanced talents in genetics, bioinformatics, and artificial intelligence. Our management team comprises experienced professionals who provide momentum for the company's development and operations.

liWenhui.name: Li Wenhui
liWenhui.title: FACMGG PhD, CTO
liWenhui.description: Trained under Nobel Prize winner in Physiology or Medicine and former President of Johns Hopkins University Daniel Nathans. Former Chief Scientist at Illumina, Founder of Breakthrough Genomics, Clinical Geneticist Molecular Biologist Scientist (CGMBS), PhD in Molecular Biology and Genetics from Johns Hopkins University, Postdoc at Caltech, Assistant Professor at USC, certified geneticist by the American College of Medical Genetics.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Protecting user privacy and sensitive health information is our top priority. Our software complies with HIPAA, CLIA, dbGaP, US-Europe data privacy safe harbor regulations, China's Cybersecurity Law, and others. Genomic information is stored in the cloud, and software users can securely access this information through web browsers with strict security measures. Patient identifiers (if provided) are stored separately from genomic information to protect privacy and confidentiality. Authorized software users have complete control over their data, including data retention and destruction. Software user data is encrypted during transmission over the internet and cloud to minimize the risk of unauthorized system access.

cta.title: Leading technological breakthroughs, driving industry development; Improving service quality, safeguarding life and health!
